my_module module¶

my_module.euclidean_distance(list_ref, list_comp, vectors)¶

Calculates the Euclidean distance (L2 norm) between pairs of vectors. :param list_ref: A list with the indices of the reference vectors. :type list_ref: integer list :param list_comp: A list with the indices of the vectors to compare to. :type list_comp: integer list :param data: The data object. :type data: numpy array

Returns

The Euclidean distance (L2 norm) for comparison vs. reference vectors.

Return type

numpy array
